paper_abstract: We study domain representations induced by dyadic subbases and show that a proper dyadic subbase of a second-countable regular space X induces an embedding of X in the set of minimal limit elements of a subdomain D of {0, 1, perpendicular to}(omega). In particular, if X is compact, then X is a retract of the set of limit elements of D.
paper_title: DOMAIN REPRESENTATIONS INDUCED BY DYADIC SUBBASES
